edu.stanford.folding.msmexplorer.util.render
Class TextImageItemRenderer

java.lang.Object
  prefuse.render.AbstractShapeRenderer
      prefuse.render.ShapeRenderer
          edu.stanford.folding.msmexplorer.util.render.TextImageItemRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
prefuse.render.Renderer
public class TextImageItemRenderer
extends prefuse.render.ShapeRenderer

Renders an item as an image and a text string. Modified by bcr to position text differently.

public void setRoundedCorner(int arcWidth,
                             int arcHeight)
Rounds the corners of the bounding rectangle in which the text string is rendered.

Parameters:
arcWidth - the width of the curved corner
arcHeight - the height of the curved corner

setMaxTextWidth

public void setMaxTextWidth(int maxWidth)
Sets the maximum width that should be allowed of the text label. A value of -1 specifies no limit (this is the default).

Parameters:
maxWidth - the maximum width of the text or -1 for no limit

getText

protected java.lang.String getText(prefuse.visual.VisualItem item)
Returns the text to draw. Subclasses can override this class to perform custom text rendering.

Parameters:
item - the item to represent as a String
Returns:
a String to draw

setImageSize

public void setImageSize(double size)
Sets the display-time scaling factor for images. This scaling is applied at rendering time, to scale the image immediately upon loading instead, refer to the setMaxImageDimensions method.

Parameters:
size - the scaling factor for displaying images

setMaxImageDimensions

public void setMaxImageDimensions(int width,
                                  int height)
Sets maximum image dimensions, used to control scaling of loaded images This scaling is enforced immediately upon loading of the image, to scale the image at rendering time instead, refer to the setImageSize method.

Parameters:
width - the max width of images (-1 for no limit)
height - the max height of images (-1 for no limit)
